scenario.title: Validate whether user is able to create a contact
scenario.step: Given user is on the contacts page
Then the contact should be visible on the screen

scenario.title: Validate whether user is able to delete a contact
scenario.step: Given user is on the contacts page
Then the deleted contact should not be visible on the screen
